conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C and D. Predict which container (E, F, G or H) it will flow into after passing through baffles.
Point A is located at the top left corner above a green baffle.
Point B is located next to point A above a yellow baffle.
Point C is located above a green baffle towards the center.
Point D is located at the top right corner above a pink baffle.
Container E is located at the bottom left corner.
Container F is located next to container E.
Container G is located towards the center bottom.
Container H is located at the bottom right corner.

premise: The liquid starts at point A and flows down the green baffle towards the bottom left corner.
conclusion: Liquid from A will flow into container E.

premise: The liquid starts at point B and flows down the yellow baffle towards the bottom left corner.
conclusion: Liquid from B will flow into container F.

premise: The liquid starts at point C and flows down the green baffle towards the bottom right corner.
conclusion: Liquid from C will flow into container G.

premise: The liquid starts at point D and flows down the pink baffle towards the bottom right corner.
conclusion: Liquid from D will flow into container H.

premise: Liquid from A will flow into container E. Liquid from B will flow into container F. Liquid from C will flow into container G. Liquid from D will flow into container H.
conclusion: Final answer: Liquid from A will flow into container E. Liquid from B will flow into container F. Liquid from C will flow into container G. Liquid from D will flow into container H.
